Načtěte tento QR kód v mobilní aplikaci: Load this QR code in mobile app to transfer your favorite events.
Load this QR code from browser.
Nová verze aplikace je k dispozici. Chce: New version of app is available. Do you want to install it now?
Načtěte QR kód z terminálu na infostánku: Load this QR code from terminal on info stand.
Aréna každý den od rána do večera, finál: Arena open daily from morning till evening, finals in Colosseum Saturday 4:00 PM
Přijďte vyhrát slávu a rezáky v Aréně za: Come win fame and scrap in the Arena behind the Námko gate, open almost always - the best warriors will then fight on Saturday at Polygon in the Colosseum event. Winner takes all!
Na Rushaven ožije i Aztlan district pod: Aztlan district comes to life at Rushaven under the leadership of Shaataz, who has prepared a NERF shooting range tournament for you. Got a "big iron on your hip"? Come behind the Town Hall and find out how sharp a shooter you are. The top three shooters will receive merchandise packs, and the best shooter will get a pimped-out NERF gun.
1. kolo Námko pátek 13:30, druhé kolo Po: 1st round Námko Friday 1:30 PM, second round Polygon 5:00 PM
Letos bude soutěž o nejlepší kostým fakt: This year's best costume competition will be truly epic. A great jury, host Marťušák, and awesome prizes for the winners await you. There will be only one category - the best costume. Smaller groups can participate, but they will be judged by the rule "a chain is only as strong as its weakest link".
1. kolo louka pátek 13:00, druhé kolo Po: 1st round meadow Friday 1:00 PM, second round Polygon 3:30 PM
Řev motorů, kulervoucí dekošky, pach pál: The roar of engines, stunning decorations, the smell of burning rubber, and GASOLINE! The first round of the best car and motorcycle competition will take place at the Meadow, the second at Polygon.
Naše krásné Nuclear Valkyries pro vás př: Our beautiful Nuclear Valkyries have prepared a great competition for the bravest warriors from all corners of the wasteland, who will measure their strength in heavy mud! You have to be there...
Luke vám potrápí závity quizem na téma \: Luke will tease your brains with a quiz on the topic "Apocalypse Before and After". Teams of up to five members can compete, registration is not necessary, just bring writing utensils and as many nerdy friends as possible.
Celou dobu festivalu až do soboty 22:00: throughout the festival until Saturday 10:00 PM
Festivalové aktivity jako LARP, soutěže: Festival activities like LARP, competitions, and tribal programs will be rewarded with achievement points. The top three AP hunters can look forward to packed loot boxes and a trophy. Achievements are loaded onto payment chips, carry them with you!
Jugger už je prostě klasika. V Polygonu: Jugger is simply a classic. Tough teams will clash in the Thunder Polygon and it will be a real show.
Nebojíš se otestovat svojí arachnofobii:
Aren't you afraid to test your arachnophobia and push the limits? So stop by Rajdenburg and tame your darkest fears with a proper spider fight!
Time: From waking up to the end of the party
Nejlepší bar v pustině ciwe, je Max Kalb: The best bar in the wasteland is Max Kalbar - everyone knows that. The all-day party (and chill) from the bartender's awakening until people are 50 shades of wasted. Come watch out for Max's tears with us!
Od probuzení dokud jede kalba: From waking up to the end of the party
Kovárna – chrám Benzínu a domov Mechanik: Kovárna - the temple of Benzín and the home of the Mechanics. In this traditional sanctum of alcoholism, expect chill during the day, and party until morning
K dispozici mezi polednem a půlnocí, vni: available between noon and midnight, but the interior is open 24/7
Chceš si vyzkoušet vytuněný post-apo cyk: Do you want to try the tuned post-apo cyclo specials? Want to show the whole town who is the strongest? Visit the KURU tribe! Unsolicited lectures on the (dis)advantages of cannibalism included!
They come from the wasteland, they are a pack of wolves, truly a bliss. They welcome you to the base with a knife, rum and piss
Od probuzení do konce kalby: From waking up to the end of the party
Přivezli další várku, tak si vezmi rukav: They've brought another batch, so grab your gloves and get cracking! On the sorting line at the Spalovač tribe you can try to find all the valuables in the pile of scrap as quickly as possible, check your aim and guessing abilities, and maybe even taste a specialty.
Provozujeme bazar, kde prodáváme věci co:
We run a bazaar, where we sell things that anyone brings. In our store, everyone can find everything they could possibly need from clothes to base decorations.
Time: From awakening to the end of the sellers' patience
Od probuzení do konce trpělivosti prodej: From awakening to the end of the sellers' patience
Jednoduchá a krátká QR procházka, kterou: A simple and short QR walk to choose your entrance path to the Wasteland. How things come out in the end says more about you than the amount of rust in Rusthaven.
Za světla a kdykoli je někdo přítomen os: During the daylight and whenever someone is present in person on the base.
Přijďte na chvilku zapomenout na okolní: Come for a moment to forget about the surrounding all-embracing rust and dirt and try your luck at the Casino. Classic gambling games, raffle, pretty girls and much more await you. But remember, there is more to lose than just what you have in your pockets.
Zastavte na pár minut nebo hodin, přijďt:
Stop by for a few minutes or hours, come play some board games and take a break from the World Outside! You can meet these deviants regularly in their modest shed right on Plácek, and one thing is certain - you will definitely not be bored with them.
So give some love to our well-known Deskoherna Silverpaw.
Každý den odpoledne, a pak podle zájmu: every day in the afternoon, and then according to interest
Od doby, co je tu Zóna (ta vopravdická),:
Since the Zone (the real one) has been here, we have been here. We're not interested in scrap, we collect artifacts and we'll gladly sell them to you. We also have DIY coffee.
Time: From awakening to the end of the sellers' patience
Přijeli z nějakého konce pustiny na svýc:
They have come from some end of the wasteland on their machines and are as untamed as the wind, wild as hungry hyenas and have brought with them a quiz of fiery water.
Time: From waking up to the end of the party
Jsme sebranka lidí, mutantů a utečenců z: We are a collection of humans, mutants and escapees from the vault. We have a shop with trinkets from all over the wasteland, where with their salesmanship they can turn around, or better, convince practically anyone to buy their trinkets.
Od probuzení do zhasnutí světel v obchůd: From waking up to lights out in the shop
Přijďte vyzvat své ne/přátelé na duel v: Come challenge your friends/enemies to a duel in Krysec! Our Pukec on steroids will show who has the fastest reflexes and fingers in the wasteland! At the same time, you can spend some caps in the traditional rat stall. Zone Rat merch and trinkets made of leather and tin from Berus
Pukec bude dostupný celý festival. Stáne: Pukec will be available throughout the festival. Rat stall at random times
Děláme dvakrát denně turnaje v palcoboxu: We hold tournaments twice a day in palcobox, woodkopf and Wencovo HŮ. If you are curious about what such typical "dirty work people" play, then stop by Auxilia Morte.
Dvakrát denně podle chuti a děr v hlavní: Twice a day according to the mood and holes in the main program
První a jediná knihovna v Rusthavenu. Kn: Rusthaven's first and only library. Books inside, rust and dust outside. You will find a book fund, tea and the necessary amount of bureaucracy here.
We are Postmen, we deliver everything and everywhere. We deliver love wishes and even threats to the addressees on time and accurately, but our prices are not low. And we have some postcards too.
Od probuzení do konce pracovní doby za p: From waking up to the end of working hours behind the counter
V pátek a v sobotu odpoledne můžete u Pr: On Friday and Saturday afternoons, you can try your luck at the Proroci minulosti in Fortunatela, for small but interesting prizes.
Chceš si vorazit a vodvázat se? Namlátit: Do you want to chill and let your hair down? Beat your friend in an arcade, beat them in fishing, or test the strength of your hand? All you have to do is take a step to the REZ Amusement Park, where we are waiting for you with our machines that are guaranteed to work, thoughtful games and who knows, maybe there will be a wheel of fortune!
Samoobslužná zábava jede čtvrtek 17-24,: self-service entertainment runs Thursday 17-24, Friday 10-14, Saturday 10-24. Service of the mats and other entertainment is then on Friday from 14:00 to 24:00
Zastav se u Západních Slovanů na domácí:
Stop by the Západní Slované for a homemade beer or their famous SlavKvas in their makeshift pub "U Rezavý Vejtřasky".
They will be happy to get you a good drink, a hookah and maybe something that is currently on the fire.And if you don't have anything to do, show up there and they'll get you something to work on, or you can try your luck in table football.
Seš ten největší bourák v okolí? A máš k: Are you the biggest car wrecker around? And do you have the balls to show it off with hotwheels cars? So stop by Vlkošedé bestie every festival day between five and eight and ask about the Drtikul Destruction Derby. Rezák for respawn, killstreak will get you slapped, the biggest wrecker will win a small trophy. And that you want to try your luck with your own car? Fine, there is a limit of 24 cans. If you don't know what we’re talking about, we'll lend you a toy car and you’ll get it faster than you can say Rustwheels.
Pátek + sobota 15:30 až 18:30 s tím, že: Friday + Saturday 15:30 to 18:30 with the possibility of extending it as needed
HOGS Mutant Motorcycle Club - nejkrásněj: The HOGS Mutant Motorcyle Club - the most beautiful Biker-Gang in the Wasteland! Come and visit us - and if you're lucky, convincing or stupidly wealthy you might get the chance to ride a round or two on the backseat of one of our bikes - or just have a drink at our bar! (Both at own risk, no warranties for lost limbs, money or good looks). You can find them behind the 326 tribe base.
Od chvíle, kdy začneme jezdit, dokud nez: Only at driving hours - after that only drinking
Jsme střelci. Umíme zacházet se zbraněmi: We are shooters. We know how to handle weapons. And we can teach it.
Turnaje v starosvetskych hrach (budeme c: Tournaments in old-world games (we will go around the area and recruit with those games during the day, and at night there will be a final in the cinema). Workshop for taking 3D photos (meoscope). We will have a TV and VHS with lesser-known action-themed erotic and action films.
